title: EDUCATION – Adds to existing law to provide that funds appropriated to public schools shall be used for the purposes identified in statute or in an appropriation.
subject: APPROPRIATIONS
EDUCATION
FUNDS
SCHOOLS AND SCHOOL DISTRICTS
